title: Dialogflow - Conversation profiles
abstract:
# Dialogflow - Conversation profiles
Conversation profiles provide some important characteristics about conversations. To list and create conversation profiles from the console, click the **Manage** tab, then click **Conversation Profiles** .
This shows a list of conversation profiles created in the agent's project for [Dialogflow Phone Gateway](/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/integration/phone-gateway) and for [Agent Assist](/agent-assist/docs/conversation-profile) . The Dialogflow Phone Gateway conversation profiles are relevant when using [Call companion](/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/call-companion) .
When creating a new conversation profile associated with the agent, the following fields are required:
- **Display name** : Display name for the conversation profile.
- **Language** : Language for the conversation profile.
- **Enable call companion** : Enable this to use call companion for Dialogflow Phone Gateway
